Description: SHIP NOTE ! Figure $32 to Boston, Chicago, Atlanta, $28 to Houston, $23 to Denver, $20 to Las Vegas, Los Angeles. Send your zipcode for a cost quote !! Danelectro Dano Blaster Blue Sparkle Electric Guitar 6 String. Please don't hesitate to ask questions as I'm ignorant of the minutiae of electric guitars and guitar is sold AS IS, no returns. Note: Due to shine there is glare from background items. The finish is quite nice and even. I plugged this guitar into an amp and it tested well to my ear while making all available adjustments to the guitar and the amp. The body is a vibrant blue fading to dark blue toward the edges. It has applied sparkles overall. There is light use wear and one little chip (see last photo). The controls, pickups, bridge, etc appear to be in tight and working condition. There is light wear to the area. Some screws have light rust. The frets and markers on the fretboard appear to be present, tight and intact. The neck on both sides is in great condition with minor use wear. Missing one string. The tuners and head appear present, tight, intact and in great condition. Measures 39" long x 13.25" widest point. Weighs 6.5 lbs.
